snippet: In a roundabout way, Armstrong may have done something to help clean up the sport of cycling by naming names in a lawsuit about doping.
abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column holds that in a roundabout way, Lance Armstrong may have done something to help clean up the sport of cycling by naming names in a lawsuit about doping.
lead_paragraph: In a roundabout way, Armstrong may have done something to help clean up the sport of cycling by naming names in a lawsuit about doping.

headline.main: Lance Armstrong’s Positive, if Reluctant, Step in a Sport’s Purification
